summary: This document is an internal FBI presentation titled 'Operational Design Strategic Planning Initiative' for CID Branch I. It outlines strategic planning challenges, a vision for improvement from a 12-month to a 3-year planning horizon, and key themes like technology innovation and resource alignment. It is a management briefing focused on internal FBI processes and does not mention any specific individuals, events, or locations related to the Epstein case.
keyFacts: Document is an FBI internal strategic planning briefing for CID Branch I.
It critiques a short 12-month planning horizon leading to 'crisis-action' planning and increased staff stress.
It proposes a new 3-year strategic planning horizon with vertical and horizontal integration.
Key planning themes include Accelerate Technology Innovation, Improve Program Management/Guidance, Intelligence and Operations Integration, and Resource Alignment.
The document contains no references to Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, victims, properties, or specific criminal activities.
